history.proof: intros x. destruct x. - apply addZ_eq1. - induction n. ++ simpl. reflexivity. ++ simpl. qsimpl time: 1. hauto lq: on depth: 3. - induction n. ++ simpl. reflexivity. ++ simpl. qsimpl time: 1. hauto lq: on depth: 3.
